definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: An application of data mining in the research of TCM syndrome theories.
sentences.chinese: 数据挖掘技术在中医证候学研究中的应用。

sentences.english: How can the results of data mining be delivered to analysts and employees who need it?
sentences.chinese: 如何将数据挖掘的结果交付给需要它的分析师和雇员？

sentences.english: The document is a group of data mining areas, cluster analysis of the algor …
sentences.chinese: 该文件是一组数据挖掘领域中，聚类分析的有关算法。

sentences.english: Intervention rule Mining from Sub-Complex system (IMSC) is a new hot spot in data mining area.
sentences.chinese: 亚复杂系统干预规则挖掘是数据挖掘领域的新内容。

sentences.english: In the end, the paper mentions the trend of the parallelizing data mining.
sentences.chinese: 在文章的最后，展望了并行数据挖掘的发展方向。

sentences.english: Decision tree is one of the important Categorising Data Mining methods.
sentences.chinese: 决策树是分类数据挖掘的重要方法。

sentences.english: Xtreme Datamining (XD) will be a tool for data mining any database efficiently. Got a database, mine it!
sentences.chinese: 这是个可对各种数据库进行有效数据挖掘的工具。

sentences.english: Blame data mining and bad analysis for multiplier sightings, Barro says.
sentences.chinese: 必须谴责瞄准乘数效应的数据挖掘和错误分析工作。

sentences.english: This paper presents a method for assessment of loess collapsibility using the data mining technology. Coefficients of collapsibility are predicted using the method.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用数据挖掘中的预测技术进行黄土湿陷性评价。

sentences.english: Data mining is the science of extracting such knowledge from large amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 数据挖掘是从大量的数据中萃取知识的一种科学。

sentences.english: Discovering frequent itemsets is important in data mining association rules.
sentences.chinese: 发现频繁项目集是关联规则数据挖掘中的关键问题。

sentences.english: This requirement leads a data-mining system to operate on the data in a common manner.
sentences.chinese: 这一需要导致数据挖掘系统以公共的方式操作数据。

sentences.english: Could data mining soon replace serendipitous observational discovery?
sentences.chinese: 未来，数据挖掘是否会代替偶然观测的发现？

sentences.english: At last, the au-thors present the tendency in the field of data mining in future.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了数据挖掘研究今后的若干发展趋势。

sentences.english: We hope to answer all of your initial questions about data mining.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望能够回答您所有关于数据挖掘的初级问题。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
lian2 ji1 fen1 xi1 chu3 li3

definition: to parse/analysis processing/to analyze and treat
